channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain works, 10th August
item.description:
The problem is in front of 62 Princes Plain. There was some.works being done on 2 drains a few weeks ago but now one has been fixed but the other in front of the property is still.covered by temporary cover. What was the job, why wasn't the home owner informed and when will it be completed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince's Plain, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard needs re-setting after crash, 10th August
item.description:
This bollard has been hit by a vehicle and needs re-setting to make it effective. Junction of Green Lanes and Brownswood Rd

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London

item.title: 3 street lights out on clipstone street, 10th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clipstone Mews, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
